sentences.en: Ask the conductor to put you off at the Odeon.
sentences.cn: 告诉售票员在奥汀提醒你下车.

sentences.en: At the conductor's whistle the engine - driver starts his locomotive - engine.
sentences.cn: 乘务员哨声一响,司机开动机车.

sentences.en: Copper is a good conductor of heat.
Graphite is a highly efficient conductor of electricity.
sentences.cn: 石墨是一种高效的电导体。

sentences.en: He has dual role as composer and conductor.
sentences.cn: 他兼作曲家及指挥的双重身分.

sentences.en: He showed his ticket to the conductor and got on.
sentences.cn: 他向检票员出示了车票，然后上了车。

sentences.en: his dual role as composer and conductor
sentences.cn: 他兼任作曲家和指挥的双重角色

sentences.en: The bus conductor collected money from the passengers.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车售票员向乘客收钱.

sentences.en: The bus conductor forgot to remind him to get off at that station.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车售票员忘记提醒他在那一站下车了。

sentences.en: The conductor beat time with a baton.
sentences.cn: 指挥用指挥棒打着拍子.

sentences.en: The conductor blew his whistle, and the tram stopped.
sentences.cn: 售票员吹哨子, 电车停了下来.

sentences.en: The conductor brought home the full thrust of the work's emotional resolution.
sentences.cn: 指挥将该作品情感上的毅然决然这一主旨充分表现了出来。

sentences.en: The conductor handed the sick man out of the bus.
sentences.cn: 售票员扶病人下公共汽车.

sentences.en: The conductor shambled to the next carriage.
sentences.cn: 售票员慵懒地拖着脚走向下一节车厢。

sentences.en: The conductor's eyes darted to Wilfred, then fixed on Michael again.
sentences.cn: 乐队指挥飞快地扫了威尔弗雷德一眼，然后视线又落回到迈克尔身上。

sentences.en: Wood is a poor conductor of heat and electricity.
sentences.cn: 木头是热和电的不良导体.

sentences.en: Wood is a poor conductor of heat.

words.tran_cn: 传导的；传导性的；有传导力的
导电性；[物][生理] 传导性
女向导；女车长；女指挥；女售票员

phrases.tran_cn: 电缆芯线；电缆导线；缆芯

trans.tran_cn: 指挥，售票员，列车员，导体
trans.tran_en: someone who stands in front of a group of musicians or singers and directs their playing or singing
